duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide power transmission application expertise to personnel and customers to maintain sales activity and increase new sales within Corporate guidelines.
Assist corporate DSM's and customers with application expertise in mechanical and electrical design engineering.
Review drive specifications and job requirements to assure technical compliance.
Make field service calls to review applications, failures, and effect repairs.
Provide selection and pricing assistance to corporate personnel and customers.
Occasionally travel domestically and overseas for company business, and stay overnight for extended periods when necessary.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor degree or higher degree in electronics, electrical, mechatronics, and computing
